- Exclusive Magpie Fields design

name: E-GIFT CERTIFICATE
description:
One-of-a-kind gifts are sometimes hard to buy and find for someone. Until now... give a Magpie Fields e-gift certificate so that special someone can pick out their own treasure! 

E-gift certificates are sent to the purchaser in a nice little box (...tied up with string ) with the personal e-gift certificate code that will never expire. 

$7 is added in the value of the gift certificate for gift packaging and shipping (for a $50 card, the charge will be $57).

description:

Diameter: 14" inches at bottom of shade

- New brass finish finials, harp, and saddle
- Variation of coloring on the stems and at the base of one of the sockets.
- New custom black silk drum shades are included. Notice the nicely added textural aspect with the silk chosen for the shades (image 2)
- Exclusive MAGPIE FIELDS piece
* LAMPSHADES INCLUDED in price
*DOMESTIC SHIPPING included in price

Finding a pair of vintage lamps is a task in itself, but to find a set as fun and quirky as this pair is an absolute treat!  To achieve a symmetric look, set the pair on each end of a console or place individually on bedside tables.  You can even break the set up and place in different rooms. There really aren't any rules; place as you please to set the look you desire!

name: Who's Who Framed Silhouettes
description:
Just as classic as a black and white photograph, is this black and white piece of art.  Add this quad of silhouetted faces to any trendy space and it will stand out as the next coveted piece of modern art. 

Length: 18" inches
Width: 14 1/4" inches

- Vintage silhouette professionally framed; original wood frame, mat board, and wiring to mount
- Signed by artist, "by Paul"
- Off-white matte board with four rectangle cut-outs
- Each rectangle cut-out has black paper topped with an off-white oval 
- The Off-white ovals have a black cut-out silhouette and are encompassed by double hand-drawn ovals in gold ink
- The two rows of silhouettes are facing one another to add an element of interest
- The attention to detail is evident in the hair and facial detailing that is sometimes left out in silhouettes
- Domestic Shipping Included

Great size to put on a shelf and lean against a wall or to hang in a mixture of gallery framed pieces. I'm not sure how anyone couldn't be in love with these faces!

name: French Sweets Sign
description:
It's not any ole vintage sign, but an original of a French bakery. Ya dig? Oui, Oui! 

Length :30" inches
Width (height) : 21" inches

- Circa 1960s-1970s
- Nice streamlined typography that reads "Bêtises de Cambrai – Afchain", a French candy company that originated in 1830 advertising it's infamous candy, Afchain.  This company is still in operation in Cambrai, France.
- Made of thin aluminum metal
- Original soft color palette of soft yellow, white, and black is seen with aged additions of the original metal and bits of rust.
- Aged signs of pealing give evidence of much character and history
- Originally from Cambrai, France but was found in Paris, France
- Domestic Shipping Included
